description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a specific model, and performs a query to generate a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with the knowledge base and performs language model tasks.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A class representing a specific language model configuration.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for vector database operations using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent for a given prompt.
